dashboard.label: Splunkbase Apps Analytics
dashboard.description: inspection of the apps history in splunkbase
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"ds_search_1_new_new_new_new_new_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup apps.csv
| stats count by display_author.name
| sort 10 - count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":""}},"name":"topauthors"},"ds_search_1_new_new_new_new_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup apps.csv 
| eval cat=split('ranking{}.category_display_name',"
")
| mvexpand cat
| stats sum(download_count) as count by cat 
| eval sankey_source = "Apps Download"
| rename cat as sankey_target, count as sankey_value
| table sankey_source, sankey_target, sankey_value","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_1_new_new_new_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup apps.csv
 | eval prod = split('product_types{}',"
")
| mvexpand prod
| eval cat=split('ranking{}.category_display_name',"
")
| mvexpand cat
| stats sum(download_count) as count by prod 
| eval sankey_source = "Apps Download"
| rename prod as sankey_target, count as sankey_value
| table sankey_source, sankey_target, sankey_value
| append 
 [| inputlookup apps.csv 
 | eval prod = split('product_types{}',"
")
| mvexpand prod
| where prod != ""
| eval cat=split('ranking{}.category_display_name',"
")
| mvexpand cat
| stats sum(download_count) as count by prod, cat 
| rename prod as sankey_source cat as sankey_target, count as sankey_value
| eval sankey_target = if (sankey_value>180000, sankey_target,"Others")
| stats sum(sankey_value) as sankey_value by sankey_source, sankey_target 
| table sankey_source, sankey_target, sankey_value]
| eval sankey_target = if(sankey_target == "", "Others" , sankey_target)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":""}},"name":"appusage"},"ds_search_1_new_new_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup apps.csv 
| fields created_time,display_author.name
| sort + created_time
| eval _time = strptime(created_time,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%QZ")
| streamstats count, distinct_count(display_author.name) as author_count
| bin span=1month _time
| timechart max(count) as "No. Of Apps", max(author_count) as "No. of Contributors"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":""}},"name":"Apps summary"},"ds_search_1_new_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup apps.csv 
 | eval cat=split('ranking{}.category_display_name',"
")
| mvexpand cat
| stats count by cat","queryParameters":{"earliest":"1715664529.000","latest":"1715664529.001"}}},"ds_search_1_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup apps.csv | stats count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup apps.csv
| where download_count != "N/A"
| fields app_name,download_count
| sort - download_count
| table app_name,download_count
| sort - download_count
| head 10","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":""}},"name":"top10apps"}},"visualizations":{"viz_table_1_new_new":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":20,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true,"columnFormat":{"count":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("count") | formatByType(countColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName('count') | pick(countRowColorsEditorConfig)","rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByName('count') | rangeValue(countRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig)"}},"backgroundColor":"> themes.defaultBackgroundColor","tableFormat":{"rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByIndex(0) | pick(tableAltRowBackgroundColorsByTheme)"},"showRowNumbers":true,"headerVisibility":"none"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new_new_new_new_new_new"},"title":"Top
